class_notes:
(Same as REL 200R 1 and WGS 285 2)
How does Religion play a role in the lives of Latinas?  How do Latinas play a role in the changing face of religious life amongst Latunx peoples?  Amerindian, African, Christian, and other traditions and religious beliefs are intrinsically woven with narratives, discourses, and experiences of sex and gender that have historically changed and been changed by Latinas.  Mothers, warriors, queens, mother nature, waters, saints, virgins, sinners, these are sole of the characters and roles that this seminar will explore to better understand the network of contemporary experiences of Latinas, religion, nature, and embodiment.
Grade distribution:
Attendance and participation: 30%.
Blog posts: 30%
Research project: 30%
Presentation:10%
